recipe_name: SautÃ©ed Swiss Chard with Parmesan Cheese
ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil, 2 tablespoons butter,   +   1/2 small red onion, diced, 1 tablespoon minced garlic, 1 bunch Swiss chard, stems and center ribs cut out and chopped together, leaves coarsely chopped separately,   +   1/2 cup dry white wine, 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice, or to taste, 2 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan cheese, 1 pinch salt to taste
nutrition: Total Fat 13g 17%, Saturated Fat 5g 25%, Cholesterol 18mg 6%, Sodium 202mg 9%, Total Carbohydrate 5g 2%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 1g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 20mg 101%, Calcium 67mg 5%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 268mg 6%
